titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2601) to authorize appropriations for the Department of State for the fiscal years 2006 and 2007, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2601) to authorize appropriations for the Department of State for the fiscal years 2006 and 2007, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-175, by Mr. Bishop (UT).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2601. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 62.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 365.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 190 (Roll no. 384).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2601) to authorize appropriations for the Department of State for FY2006-FY2007.
